ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AJ4CO Terminated Folded Dipole and Dual-Radio JOVE receiver system

RevisionEvent.Note: RadioJOVE: Update obsolete radiojove.gsfc.nasa.gov and www.typnet.net URLs, Resource Header Description reformated. Metadata submitted by J.M. Weygand on 2022-02-11, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description:
Terminated Folded Dipole and Dual-Radio JOVE receiver system at the AJ4CO Radio Astronomy Observatory in High Springs, Florida.

The TFD array consists of two 4-element (32 foot) square array. Each antenna element is 32 feet long. TFD array is aligned to true north. The Dual-Radio JOVE receiver system operates with two separate Radio JOVE receivers at 20.1 MHz providing uncorrelated RCP and LCP.

See the Information URL for a link to a document providing additional descriptions of the instrument characteristics.

InformationURL.Name: RadioJOVE Spectrograph Users Group

InformationURL.Description: This site provides descriptions of radio receiver systems at AJ4CO, observation logs and other documentation
